import React from 'react'; import ContactCard from './ContactCard'; function ContactBlock() { const contactBlockCont = { background: '#eff', color: '#fff', display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', height: '40vw', maxHeight: '400px', padding: '4vw 0 4vw 0', } const leftBlockContent = { flex: '2', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', justifyContent: 'space-around', // margin: '4vw 0', } const heading = { flex: '1', fontSize: '4.5vw', fontWeight: '600', margin: '20px 0 0 0' } const rightBlock = { width: '50%', height: '100%', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', } const leftBlock = { backgroundColor: 'rgba(21,28,41, .8)', width: '50%', height: '30vw', maxHeight: '400px', borderRight: '1px solid #151C29', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', borderRadius: '0 10px 10px 0', } const topBlock = { backgroundColor: 'rgba(21,28,41, .8)', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', height: '43%', margin: '0 0 1vw 2vw', borderRadius: '10px 0 0 10px', padding: '5px 10px', } const bottomBlock = { backgroundColor: 'rgba(21,28,41, .8)', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', height: '43%', margin: '1vw 0 0 2vw', borderRadius: '10px 0 0 10px', padding: '5px 10px', } return (
Contact Us
Phone:
703-865-2514
Address:
774-A Walker Road
Great Falls, VA 22066
); } export default ContactBlock;
